title: Bugs
body:
After the new update, I have received many a "_glitches" or "bugs_". The most common occurrence of said "_bugs/glitches_" is not being able to see messages that I have sent or received from others, nor can I open the party chat when in **queue** with friends. Other _bugs_ include rune pages increasing in zoom by 150% and mastery pages having no options to return points or add them.

Riot pls, what is wrong ?{{champion:106}}

replies.body: That bug is groovy. I thought they said they completely fixed it, though. It's got to do with your internet browser not listening to the scaling settings when loading content. Have you tried reinstalling Internet Explorer (if you're on Windows, that is)?
